item.title: SHOPS, A big problem.... Help please?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Because the compiler does not compile .cfg files, you will never get an error. Meaning, you dont even need to compile to have those changes, just restart the server.

Also, the problem is that you probably used a space somewhere instead of a tab.

Read full topic

item.title: SHOPS, A big problem.... Help please?
item.dc:creator: @Slashx123 Slashx123
item.description:
@Slashx123 wrote:

Ok, so i have a problem with making my shop… Ive added it to the Client, Wich looks like this:


            } else if (NPCID == 520) {
                PutNPCCoords = true;
                WanneShop = 2; 
             } else if (NPCID == 554) { 
                PutNPCCoords = true;
                WanneShop = 48; 
            }  else if (NPCID == 520) {
	        PutNPCCoords = true;
	        WanneShop = 5;
            }  else if (NPCID == 522) { // so this is the NPC Used, SHopkeeper
	PutNPCCoords = true;
	WanneShop = 10; // and this is the shop id.
}

Then, Here is my autospawn code.

spawn = 522     3215     3417     0      0      0      0      0      1      test

and here is my shops.cfg code

shop = 10 Test 100 2597 15183 100 15181 100 14819 100 14868 100 14869 100 14870 100

But now, When i save all, compile and run, No errors. When i click trade with that npc i get DC’d and i get this error.

Can anyone help? Anyone see any problem with it?

Read full topic
item.source: SHOPS, A big problem.... Help please?
